promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic mythical deer fire-type pokemon wearing golden armor. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrostag, a a dynamic mythical deer fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Scorching Column, Power Pinch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "fire" or "Pyrostag". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, deer-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Thriving in magma-rich areas, Pyrostag uses Scorching Column and Power Pinch to thrive. Its antlers glow red from ambient heat.
